title: How to Install a Magnaflow Tip on 2012 Dodge Challenger
description: See how easy it is - and each simple step it takes - to remove your stock tip and replace it with an eye-catching Magnaflow exhaust tip.
tags: Magnaflow Exhaust Tips, 2011 Dodge Challenger, How to install exhaust tips Dodge Challenger

asset.title: 2012 Dodge Challenger MagnaFlow Tip install
asset.description:
How easy is it to install MagnaFlow tips? We show you step by step how to remove stock tips & install ours on the 2012 Dodge Challenger in our tech center.

These tips are designed for this application (2009-2013 Dodge Challenger.) The factory tip unbolts and allows the use of the aftermarket, Original Equipment inspired style quad tip to be added to the stock or Magnaflow exhaust for factory tips, with minimal work.

Learn more: http://www.magnaflow.com/02product/displayapplications.asp?partnumber=35221
